revised_title: Gating Currents in the Node of Ranvier: Voltage and Time Dependence
tldr: This study investigates the gating currents in the node of Ranvier, focusing on the voltage and time dependence of these currents. The results suggest that the node of Ranvier has ten times more sodium channels than the squid giant axon, with similar sodium conductance per channel. The findings provide insights into the functioning of the nervous system and the control of sodium conductance.
